#summary Latest changes to the API
#labels Featured

=== May 5, 2010 ===
  * The "meta" query parameter is now more accurately named "series".
=== Apr 7, 2010 ===
  * "aspect" switch
    * Now uses a "query parameter" rather than a final "path segment" to determine whether a cursor is providing, "axes", "meta", or "data" rows. [http://code.google.com/p/chartdroid/wiki/InterfaceSpecification#Content_Provider More details]
  * Finer-grained "presentation" categories
    * [http://code.google.com/p/chartdroid/wiki/InterfaceSpecification#Data_type More details]
